definition: a long piece of brightly colored cloth, such as cotton or silk, used as clothing in India, Pakistan, and Burma; also known as a sarong
details:
noun
- a long piece of brightly colored cloth, such as cotton or silk, used as clothing in India, Pakistan, and Burma; also known as a sarong
= example: a long piece of brightly colored cloth, such as cotton or silk, used as clothing in India, Pakistan, and Burma; also known as a sarong
= synonyms: lungyi, longyi
